options.text: <a href="reader.html?chapter=epilogue_b", style="color:var(--background-light);">I want to see Shinjuku Academy and other possibilities.
<a href="reader.html?chapter=epilogue_c", style="color:var(--background-light);">There are things I want to do in both the police and Shinjuku.

text:
His sharp eyes widened the moment he heard the answer.
For an instant, his expression almost broke into a smile, but it immediately tightened.

name: Jagannath
text:
...You really sure about this?
You seriously don't need to decide now.

name: Jagannath
text:
You probably already know, but the police are full of crazy trouble.
For someone like you, the danger will be even greater.

options.text: I still want to be a source of strength for you, Jagannath.

text:
He took a sharp breath at the answer.
After a few seconds of silence, he slowly nodded.

name: Jagannath
text:
...I see. Then I've got to make up my mind too.
After all, this is the proposal of a lifetime I'm responding to.

name: Jagannath
text:
Alright. I'll protect you with my life. In exchange—
you follow me with everything you've got for the rest of your life, okay?

Confirming from [Player]'s expression,
Jagannath thrust his fist forward.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh. Well then, I'll be counting on
you for a long time to come— my Buddy.

Just as it seemed he would wrap his arm around [Player]'s shoulder,
he brought his face close and bared his teeth in a grin.
Their pure white breath melted together into the crisp, cold air.

Behind them, their footprints stretched back through the snow—
And, ahead of them, the fresh, untouched white extended forever.

Christmas Street Fight
～Ruthless Winter Festival Struggle!～
—END—
